SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM( SELECT DISTINCT C.COMP_CODE, M.ID, C.AGE, C.COM_NAME, C.COMP_TITLE, C.COMP_COUNT, C.COMP_LOCAL, C.COMP_START_DATE, C.COMP_END_DATE, C.COMP_CONTENT, C.COU_CODE, C.IMG_GRO_CODE, M.TEL, M.NAME, M.GENDER, I.IMG_NAME, I.IMG_PATH FROM COMPANION C ,MEMBER M, IMAGE I WHERE C.ID= M.ID AND C.IMG_GRO_CODE = I.IMG_GRO_CODE ORDER BY COMP_CODE DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <=#{last} ) B WHERE RN >=#{first}
SELECT * FROM COMPANION c INNER JOIN common co ON c.com_Code = co.com_Code INNER JOIN image i ON c.img_gro_code = i.img_gro_code WHERE c.COMP_CODE = #{compCode}
SELECT co.com_Name FROM COMPANION c inner join common co on c.comp_Local = co.com_Code WHERE c.COMP_CODE = #{compCode}
